homeAboutWhyChooseDesc:
As a regular import car dealer that handles imported car brands, focusing on Volkswagen and Audi for many years, we have been proposing car lifestyles through import car sales.
Looking ahead to the future, we can respond flexibly to the ever-changing market, needs, and customer feedback, and we can provide high-quality cars because they are listed by authorized dealers.
aboutHeader: We are continuously learning, building a new roadmap for TCOMIE, and creating connected values with 3 outlooks:
aboutHeaderHome: With outstanding individuals in the fields of Technology, Telecommunication solutions, and Green Energy, TCOMIE gathers an internal strength group and 16 years of experience as consultants, and solution seekers which we desire to bring to our customers and the community:
about1: Inspire and empower each other to be more creative, confidently share, and together create a pioneering community, dedicated to the mission of promoting the sustainable prosperity of the community.
about2: Earn the customer's trust through listening, analyzing demands, and transforming discrete ideas into core values in the customerâ€™s organization.
about3: Use a part of the received value, contributing back to the environment and society.

project_1: Operate the automatic optimization system for mobile network Mobifone in Vietnam.
project_2: Installing Smart site IoT equipment for MobiFone in 12 Western provinces.
project_3: Providing software tools to display mobile stations on the WEBGIS platform.
